objects.text:
• Premium Canvas Material
• Navy Blue Classic Design
• Cushioned Insole
• Durable White Rubber Sole

product_details.name: Classic Canvas Comfort: Urban Casual Sneakers in Navy Blue
product_details.description:
• Premium quality canvas material for breathable comfort
• Sleek navy blue design perfect for casual and smart-casual outfits
• Durable white rubber sole with excellent grip
• Metallic eyelets with matching navy laces for secure fit
• Lightweight construction for all-day wear
• Classic low-top silhouette with minimalist styling
• Cushioned insole for enhanced comfort
• Versatile design suitable for both men and women
• Easy-to-clean canvas exterior
• Perfect for daily wear, casual outings, and weekend activities

banner_details:
This vibrant banner is designed for a promotional footwear campaign. It is divided into four quadrants using a grid background for visual structure. The top left section features a bold and clear marketing message with the main headline in large white uppercase letters (text ID: "heading"), followed by a prominent subheading in a light orange hue (text ID: "subheading"). Below this, the product title appears in a hand-sketched font style (text ID: "product_title") and a tagline emphasizing time sensitivity (text ID: "tagline"). The top right quadrant hosts a clean product image (image ID: "product_image") of navy canvas sneakers.

The bottom half is split between a vibrant orange left panel and a soft peach right panel. The orange section includes product features using bullet points (text ID: "description"), an original price crossed out (text ID: "original_price"), a larger discounted price (text ID: "sale_price"), and a strong call-to-action button (rect ID: "cta_button") with actionable text (text ID: "cta"). In the peach section, an urgency prompt encourages immediate action (text ID: "urgency_text").

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #2E4482
- Deep Blue: #1A2A56
- Bright Orange: #FF6B35
- Peach Orange: #FFA069
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of canvas sneakers in a rich navy blue (#1E3A5F), complemented by silver eyelets (#C0C0C0) and clean white soles (#F7F7F7). The dark navy provides a classy, versatile base, conveying comfort and stylish minimalism. The white soles and stitching contrast sharply, drawing attention to the shoe's silhouette and enhancing its definition. Subtle light reflections add depth, while the silver eyelets discreetly add a metallic accent. For a cohesive advertisement banner, a palette of navy blue (#1E3A5F), steel grey (#A0A9B4), white (#F7F7F7), and sky blue (#ADD8E6) can be used. These tones highlight the product’s sleek and modern appeal.
